original_text: But God struck down some of the inhabitants of Beth Shemesh, putting seventy of them to death because they looked into the ark of the Lord. The people mourned because of the heavy blow the Lord had dealt them.
korean_text: 벧세메스 사람들이 여호와의 궤를 들여다 본 까닭에 그들을 치사 (오만) 칠십 명을 죽이신지라 여호와께서 백성을 쳐서 크게 살륙하셨으므로 백성이 슬피 울었더라

sentences.original_text: some of the inhabitants of Beth Shemesh
putting seventy of them to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 칠십 명을 죽게 하시니

sentences.original_text: because they looked into the ark of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 여호와의 언약궤를 들여다보았기 때문이라
